extensionDescription.message: WarnAttachment shows an additional dialog to confirm opening of potentially dangerous attachments. Some attachments like executables etc. are completely blocked. This reduces the risk of malware especially for inexperienced users.

warningText.message: This file might contain malicious content. Please double-check if the source is trustworthy.

warningTextHint.message: I would like to open this file anyhow.

blockingText.message: To protect you against malware, this attachment cannot be opened on this machine.

options.warn.desc.message: A warning dialog will be shown for these file extensions. This field contains comma-separated values.

options.blocked.desc.message: These file extensions will be blocked completely. This field contains comma-separated values.

options.warn.user.desc.message: Leave empty to use default message.

options.blocked.user.title.message: User defined message for blocked attachments:

options.blocked.user.desc.message: Leave empty to use default message.

options.info.text.link.license.message: Show license online (GNU General Public License v3.0)
